name: FinaldiagnosisofHIVexposedinfant
title: Final diagnosis of HIV-exposed infant
description: HIV-exposed infant final status at 18 months or 3 months after cessation of breastfeeding (whichever is later), if not sooner if dead or HIV-positive and date of death if dead (died; LTF; transferred out; active in care but not tested at 18 months)

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.definition: HIV-exposed infant final status at 18 months or 3 months after cessation of breastfeeding (whichever is later), if not sooner if dead or HIV-positive and date of death if dead (died; LTF; transferred out; active in care but not tested at 18 months)
element.comment: Data collection tool: Child health card; HEI register; lab register?Use of data element: HEI patient monitoring and reporting?Remarks:
